results.title: Statin reduces the platelet P-selectin expression in atherosclerotic ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: Thirty-two (28 @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@, 4 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; mean age 59.8 +/- 9.6 years) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Arteriosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002537 @@@atherosclerotic ischemic stroke@@@ were assigned to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg per day for 12 weeks and discontinued for another 12 weeks.

citations.NLM: Cha JK, Jeong MH, Kim JW. Statin reduces the platelet P-selectin expression in atherosclerotic ischemic stroke. J Thromb Thrombolysis. 2004 Aug;18(1):39-42. PMID: 15744552
citations.BibTeX: @article{15744552, title={Statin reduces the platelet P-selectin expression in atherosclerotic ischemic stroke.}, author={Cha JK and Jeong MH and Kim JW}, journal={J Thromb Thrombolysis}, volume={18}, number={1}, pages={39-42}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces OX40 and OX40 ligand expression in human peripheral blood mononuclear cells and in patients with atherosclerotic cerebral infarction.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @GENE_TNFRSF4 @GENE_7293 @@@OX40@@@ and @GENE_TNFSF4 @GENE_7292 @@@OX40 ligand@@@ expression in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ peripheral blood mononuclear cells and in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Arteriosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002537 @@@atherosclerotic cerebral infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu B, Yu G, Yang Z, Sun L, Song R, Liu F, Xin Y, Zhang L. Simvastatin reduces OX40 and OX40 ligand expression in human peripheral blood mononuclear cells and in patients with atherosclerotic cerebral infarction. J Int Med Res. 2009 May-Jun;37(3):601-10. PMID: 19589242
citations.BibTeX: @article{19589242, title={Simvastatin reduces OX40 and OX40 ligand expression in human peripheral blood mononuclear cells and in patients with atherosclerotic cerebral infarction.}, author={Liu B and Yu G and Yang Z and Sun L and Song R and Liu F and Xin Y and Zhang L}, journal={J Int Med Res}, volume={37}, number={3}, pages={601-10}}
